Welcome, everyone, to the return of Growing Beauty. I've been offline for a while, and when I returned, it seems that my computer had a bit of a nervous breakdown and ate this story. So, while it might end up looking a bit different, I hope you all enjoy it!

Finally, I know that there are some folks out there who come to these interactives just to leave bad reviews. Please, if you don't like it, then by all means give me a poor rating.
